title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Rural and Community Development) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department rural community development) order 2023

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Anne-Marie McNally, particulars of whose address have been
text_raw:
2. Anne-Marie McNally, particulars of whose address have been 
deposited at the offices of the Department of Rural and Community 
Development, is appointed as Special Adviser to Joe O’Brien, Minister of State 
at the Department of Rural and Community Development with effect from 21 
December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

14 February, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [70] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
